oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Winterraps in der Fruchtfolge des Ökologischen Landbaus
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Becker, Dr Konstantin
Leithold, Prof. Dr. Guenter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Crop combinations and interactions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cropping of rape seed is rather uncommon in organic farming. Still, rape seed cropping can contribute to efficient nutrient utilization (especially of nitrogen) in a crop rotation. This paper presents results on nitrogen dynamics after perennial clover grass as affected by rape seed cropping compared to winter wheat. It could be shown, that Nmin amounts in the soil are lowered by rape seed compared to winter wheat.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Becker, Dr Konstantin and Leithold, Prof. Dr. Guenter (2009) Winterraps in der Fruchtfolge des Ökologischen Landbaus. Poster at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
